description:
Truth behind A headscarf and authoritative of Alhadith (Arabic)by Kansler / Mohammad Said al-Ashmawi



This Book is about the issue of the hijab (headscarf) which is forced on women in Islamic societies under the pretext that it a part of the  Islamic sharia law. Is it a religious obligation, in fact, or what is it like this headscarf? Read with us the fact that the hijab.
